SELECT a1.Name,a1.IxnID,a1.StartDate,a1.EndDate,a1.EntityTypeID,a1.TheComment, ISNULL(b1.CodeName, '') AS CodeName FROM (SELECT a.*, b.USER_NAME AS Name FROM tblInteraction a, tblCfg_Person b WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE
Convert(DateTime,a.StartDate) >=Convert(DateTime,#{Startdate})
AND Convert(DateTime,a.ENDDATE) <= Convert(DateTime,DATEADD(day,1,#{Enddate}))
AND a.AGENTID = #{agentid}
AND a.CONTACTID = #{contactid}
AND a.AgentID = b.DBID ) a1
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT [InteractionID], left(e.CodeName,len(e.CodeName)-1) AS CODENAME FROM (SELECT distinct [InteractionID], (SELECT cast(c1_2.[CodeName] AS NVARCHAR ) + ',' FROM (SELECT c.[InteractionID], d.CodeName FROM [tblRpt_Activitylog] c, tblCfg_ActivityData d WHERE c.ActivityDataID =d.dbid) c1_2 WHERE c1_2.[InteractionID] = c1_1.[InteractionID] FOR XML PATH('') ) as CodeName from (SELECT c.[InteractionID], d.CodeName FROM [tblRpt_Activitylog] c, tblCfg_ActivityData d WHERE c.ActivityDataID =d.dbid) c1_1) e ) b1 ON a1.IxnID = b1.InteractionID
